JobFullDesc: Facebook’s FRL division is developing future products in augmented reality and virtual reality with breakthrough work in computer vision, advanced optics, eye tracking, and mixed reality that will enable groundbreaking experiences for consumers and businesses. The FRL Growth Products team is responsible for developing world-class growth product experiences to drive acquisition, referral, engagement, retention and monetization viral loops to maximize our business growth. This role will work with a cross-functional team including product managers, engineering, DS, Design and research teams to build these data driven solutions. Typical projects will include working with family of apps orgs (Messenger, FB, Instagram, WhatsApp) on integrating AR/VR experiences to drive growth, working with the ads org to build ads for the AR/VR ecosystem, working across FRL to develop viral hardware referral programs and incentives. Additionally, this role will partner with the data science team to build cutting-edge products, like real-time bidders.
